title: Remember Her Name
description: Remember Her Name is the upcoming debut studio album by American country artist Mickey Guyton. It is scheduled to be released on September 24, 2021 via Capitol Records Nashville. A follow-up release to her extended play, Bridges (2020), the album includes the singles "What Are You Gonna Tell Her?", "Black Like Me" and a re-recorded version of her 2015 single, "Better Than You Left Me".
